responsibilities: An online documentation platform for creating, managing and sharing docs. Formatted documentation is easily written using an online text editor and Markdown.

details: Summer work placement in IBM's design studio as a front-end developer. Part of a team tasked with finding new ways to communicate IBM's Design Thinking. The project went on to win an IDI award for best Design Education and Industry project.
responsibilities: exploring ways technology can be used to engage with the user
working with designers to rapidly build prototypes to validate concepts
working with the team to build a working prototype of the system we proposed which was eventually presented to the president and chief technical officer of IBM Design

details: Joined a full development team for a 5 month work placement as a web developer. As a result of my performance I was offered a part time position when college resumed.
responsibilities: working as part of the development team to build commercial applications and websites
working closely with experienced designers to ensure the finished application/website met the high standards the client expected
providing client training on completion of products
designing, developing and maintaining fully functioning websites, several of these were integrated with the businesses custom backend systems
working with a backend developer to add new features to the website/backend system
working with an SEO expert to ensure the website ranked as high as possible organically
